section.title: Charts.Chart Class Reference

literallayout.computeroutput:
The Chart class have:
Attributes: ax : encapsulates all the elements of an individual (sub-)plot in a figure.
Methods: show_error_message() : Function that makes a new window to show that there is an error. show_color(concrete_option) : Function that checks whether the option name has a 'G' for green, 'R' for red or 'B' for blue. If none, still return 'b' for blue.

section.title: __init__()
section.para: Reimplemented in Charts.Line_Chart, Charts.Average_Chart, and Charts.Line_Chart_of_specific_Type.

section.section:
Member Function Documentation
show_color() show_colorCharts.Chart Charts.Chartshow_color
Charts.Chart.show_color ( self, concrete_option)
show_color() Function that checks whether the option name has a 'G' for green, 'R' for red or 'B' for blue. If none, still return 'b' for blue.
Arg: concrete_option (str) : The option that is selected
Returns: 'g', 'r', or 'b'(str)
show_error_message() show_error_messageCharts.Chart Charts.Chartshow_error_message
Charts.Chart.show_error_message ( self)
show_error_message() Function that makes a new window to show that there is an error.
